name: billings
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large city in the US state of Montana: His family moved to Billings when he was nine years old. The office is located in the centre of Billings. Both hospitals in Billings derive a large portion of their business from outside Yellowstone County. Those customers live mostly in rural areas between Great Falls and Billings.
More examplesFewer examplesThe plane encountered severe turbulence as it was making its descent into Billings, Montana.
